item.title: 阿斯特拉承诺在斯塔默访华期间投资中国150亿美元
item.description: 阿斯利康公司宣布将在2030年前向中国投资150亿美元，用于扩大药品生产、研发及制造能力，进一步巩固这家英国制药巨头在中国的业务布局。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc will invest $15 billion in China through 2030 to expand medicines and manufacturing and research and development, in a further commitment to the UK drugmaker’s already sizeable presence in the mainland.】

item.title: 黑石集团正就成为新世界最大股东进行深入谈判
item.description: 知情人士透露，黑石集团正就成为新世界发展有限公司最大单一股东进行深入谈判。此举将导致香港最富有的家族之一放弃对一项重要资产的控制权。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is in advanced talks to become the single largest shareholder of New World Development Co., according to people familiar with the matter, a move that would see one of Hong Kong’s richest families relinquish control of a major asset.】

item.title: 布伦特原油触及每桶70美元，特朗普加剧对伊朗威胁
item.description: 布伦特原油期货价格升至每桶70美元，创下自去年9月以来的新高。此前美国总统特朗普警告伊朗，要么达成核协议，要么面临军事打击。【原文：Brent crude futures hit $70 a barrel for the first time since September after US President Donald Trump warned Iran to make a nuclear deal or face military strikes.】

item.title: 阿布扎比财富基金ADQ首席执行官离职，转任Lunate公司职务
item.description: 阿布扎比规模达2630亿美元的财富基金ADQ首席执行官即将离职，转任Lunate公司新职。这家资产管理公司自两年前成立以来，已发展成为全球增长最快的资产管理机构之一。【原文：The chief executive officer of Abu Dhabi’s $263 billion wealth fund ADQ is stepping down to take on a new role at Lunate, which has grown into one of the world’s fastest-growing asset managers since it was set up two years ago.】

item.title: 苹果财报将揭示内存价格上涨的冲击力度
item.description: 苹果公司股价承压，投资者正试图评估内存价格的快速上涨对其利润的侵蚀程度。当这家iPhone制造商在周四收盘后公布财报时，投资者将获得初步线索。【原文：Apple Inc.’s stock is taking a hit as investors try to assess how much rapidly rising memory prices are eating into its bottom line. Investors will get a peek when the iPhone maker reports its earnings after the close Thursday.】

item.title: 零散交易：在委内瑞拉和乌克兰做大生意（播客）
item.description: 特朗普政府表示，在逮捕马杜罗后，现阶段希望推动对委内瑞拉的私人投资。 而乌克兰终将面临大规模重建需求。但跨国巨头在这些地区实际运营究竟是何种体验？本期节目中，我们采访了农业咨询机构AgrisAcademy的联合创始人杰夫·卡津与迈克·罗尔夫森——他们曾长期供职于嘉吉公司。杰夫曾执掌嘉吉委内瑞拉业务，迈克则担任该公司...【原文：The Trump administration says it wants to kick start private investment in Venezuela now that it’s captured Maduro. And Ukraine is eventually going to need a massive rebuild. But what is it like for a big multinational to actually operate in these types of places? In this episode, we speak with Jeff Kazin and Mike Rohlfsen, the cofounders of agricultural consultancy AgrisAcademy and former long-time Cargill employees. Jeff previously ran Cargill’s Venezuelan business and Mike was the company’s f】

item.title: 印度航空将订购30架波音737 MAX客机，以应对激增的旅行需求
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度航空公司即将敲定追加订购30架波音737 MAX客机的订单。随着全球人口最多的国家航空旅行需求激增，此举是该公司激进机队扩张计划的一部分。【原文：Air India Ltd. is set to firm up an order for an additional 30 Boeing Co. 737 Max aircraft, according to people familiar with the plan, part of an aggressive fleet expansion as air travel demand surges in the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 英国负电价激增为电池产业繁荣打开大门
item.description: 随着可再生能源发电量增速超过电力需求，英国负电价现象今年预计将翻倍以上。【原文：Instances of negative power prices in Britain are set to more than double this year as renewable generation expands faster than electricity demand.】

item.title: 韩国1万亿美元养老基金瞄准外汇债券，韩元汇率波动加剧
item.description: 韩国国民养老金服务机构正考虑包括发行外币债券在内的多种方案，以应对汇率波动加剧的局面，实现融资渠道多元化。【原文：South Korea’s National Pension Service is weighing options including issuance of foreign-currency bonds to diversify its financing in the face of rising exchange-rate volatility.】

item.title: 尼日利亚拟筹集29亿美元债务以解决电力短缺问题
item.description: 尼日利亚计划从国内资本市场筹集4万亿奈拉（约合29亿美元），用于偿还拖欠电力公司的债务，以期结束这个西非国家长期存在的停电问题。【原文：Nigeria plans to raise 4 trillion naira ($2.9 billion) from its domestic capital markets to settle outstanding debts owed to power companies as it seeks to end perennial blackouts in the West African nation.】

item.title: 紫金矿业拟发行15亿美元可转换债券，黄金价格持续攀升
item.description: 紫金矿业集团正计划通过发行可转换债券筹集15亿美元资金，此时金价正创下历史新高。【原文：Zijin Mining Group Co. is seeking $1.5 billion from the sale of bonds that can be converted into stock as the price of gold hits record highs.】

item.title: 道达尔能源重启搁置五年的200亿美元莫桑比克液化天然气项目
item.description: 道达尔能源公司正式重启在莫桑比克价值200亿美元的液化天然气项目建设，结束了这项非洲史上最大投资项目近五年的延迟开发。【原文：TotalEnergies SE is formally restarting construction of a $20 billion liquefied natural gas project in Mozambique, ending a nearly five-year delay in developing one of Africa’s biggest-ever investments.】

item.title: 瑞典维持利率不变，在经济复苏势头增强之际重申暂停加息计划
item.description: 瑞典央行连续第四个月维持借贷成本不变，并坚持其预测——明年之前不会调整利率，因为越来越多的证据表明，经济复苏将足够强劲，足以使通胀率保持在目标附近。【原文：Sweden’s central bank held borrowing costs steady for a fourth month and stuck with its forecast for no change until next year as evidence builds that an economic recovery will be strong enough to keep inflation close to its target.】

item.title: 奋进号创纪录回报投资者，金价飙升
item.description: 恩德弗矿业公司（Endeavour Mining Plc）在贵金属价格大幅上涨后，去年向股东返还了创纪录的4.35亿美元。该公司拥有西非的金矿。【原文：Endeavour Mining Plc, which owns gold mines in West Africa, returned a record $435 million to shareholders last year after the price of the precious metal rallied sharply.】

item.title: 贝克休斯首席执行官称委内瑞拉石油产量将逐步增长
item.description: 委内瑞拉短期内可逐步提高石油产量，但全球油田服务巨头之一的负责人表示，要大幅恢复该国产量，需要进行全面改革。【原文：Venezuela can lift oil output incrementally in the near term, but sweeping changes are needed to significantly revive the country’s production, according to the boss of one of the world’s oilfield services giants.】

item.title: 中国处决11名涉缅甸网络诈骗中心人员
item.description: 据官方媒体报道，中国已处决11名涉缅甸诈骗中心人员，其中包括参与该行动的"核心成员"。【原文：China has executed 11 people linked to scam centers in Myanmar, including “core members” involved in the operation, according to state media.】

item.title: 东京电力子公司将出售价值1500亿日元的关电工股份
item.description: 东京电力公司旗下子公司计划减持某电力基础设施建设企业的股份，这家日本最大电力公司正寻求筹集资金。【原文：A unit of Tokyo Electric Power Co. plans to reduce its stake in an electrical-infrastructure builder, as Japan’s biggest utility seeks to raise funds.】

item.title: 奥卡多加拿大合作伙伴Sobeys关闭仓库，遭遇新挫折
item.description: 奥卡多集团的加拿大合作伙伴将关闭其位于卡尔加里的自动化仓库，原因是阿尔伯塔地区增长低于预期，这是这家英国在线杂货配送公司遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：Ocado Group Plc’s Canadian partner will close its automated warehouse in Calgary due to slower-than-expected growth in the Alberta area, the latest setback for the British online grocery delivery company.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席财务官在贝森特电话后誓言保持研究独立性
item.description: 德意志银行集团无意削弱其研究部门的独立性，此前一份引发争议的报告促使首席执行官克里斯蒂安·索伊宁致电美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has no plans to curtail the independence of its research after a controversial report prompted Chief Executive Officer Christian Sewing to call US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.】

item.title: 美国放宽关税后，瑞士手表出口重现增长
item.description: 在关税政策放宽后，瑞士手表品牌争相向美国市场发运库存，使该国手表出口在连续四个月下滑后重现增长态势。【原文：Swiss watch exports returned to growth after four months of declines as brands rushed to send inventory to the US after it eased tariffs.】

item.title: 债券投资者担忧法国预算缓解只是昙花一现
item.description: 法国今年在控制预算赤字方面取得的进展未能打动部分债券投资者，他们认为财政恶化的风险只是被推迟了。【原文：France’s progress this year in reining in its budget deficit has failed to impress some bond investors, who say the risk of fiscal deterioration has just been pushed down the road.】

item.title: 印尼股市因监管机构流通股计划收窄跌幅
item.description: 印尼股市收复大部分跌幅，此前监管机构表示计划将最低流通股要求提高一倍，且其主权财富基金丹纳塔拉可能积极参与市场。【原文：Indonesian equities pared most of their losses after regulators said they plan to double the minimum free-float requirements and that its sovereign wealth fund Danantara may actively participate in the market.】

item.title: 土耳其股市有望创1997年以来最佳1月表现，投资者蜂拥而入
item.description: 土耳其股市有望创下29年来最佳1月表现，新兴市场乐观情绪与低估值吸引外国投资者重返市场。【原文：Turkish stocks are poised for their best January in 29 years as the wave of optimism around emerging markets and cheap valuations lure foreign investors back into the market.】

item.title: 茅台领涨白酒股，节日需求推升股价
item.description: 贵州茅台股价创逾一年最大涨幅，因农历新年假期前夕市场看好这家中国白酒巨头的需求增长前景。【原文：Kweichow Moutai Co. shares surged the most in more than a year amid optimism over growing demand for the Chinese distiller ahead of the Lunar New Year holidays.】

item.title: 三菱电机支持初创企业进军人工智能工厂机器人领域
item.description: 三菱电机公司正支持建筑科技初创企业Akari Inc.，这是整个行业为实现工厂全面自动化、训练机器人应对不同情境而寻求技术支持的最新举措。【原文：Mitsubishi Electric Corp. is backing construction-tech startup Akari Inc., the latest in a sector-wide quest for knowhow to fully automate factories and train robots to react to different situations.】

item.title: 2025年瑞士对美出口创历史新高，逆特朗普关税而上
item.description: 2025年，瑞士对美国出口商品创下历史新高，这发生在特朗普总统对瑞士征收最高关税的时期。【原文：Switzerland exported a record amount of goods to the US in 2025, defying a period when President Donald Trump inflicted some of his highest tariffs on the country.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称中国政府尚未批准H200进口
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官表示，该公司尚未收到中国客户对其H200人工智能芯片的任何订单，因为北京方面仍在决定是否允许进口这家美国公司的芯片产品。【原文：Nvidia Corp. hasn’t yet received any orders from Chinese customers for its H200 AI chips as Beijing is still deciding whether to allow imports of the US firm’s components, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 印度削减对俄石油依赖，信实集团计划降低俄罗斯原油进口量
item.description: 知情人士透露，信实工业公司本月首次暂停自2022年以来从俄罗斯进口原油，但将从2月起每日采购约15万桶原油，同时继续从莫斯科未受制裁的生产商处进行有限采购。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd., which paused Russian crude imports this month for the first time since 2022, will take around 150,000 barrels a day from February as it presses ahead with limited purchases from Moscow’s non-sanctioned producers, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英镑走强，美元走弱，富时指数有望上涨
